Html:
While using the PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007
  1. On WAMP: (This combo works)
    • PHP
      PHP 5.3.13
    • ZIP
      Zip enabled, Extension Version $Id$, Zip version 1.9.1, Libzip version 0.9.0
    • XML
      XML Support active, XML Namespace Support active, libxml2 Version 2.7.8
    • GD2
      GD Support enabled
      GD Version bundled (2.0.34 compatible)
      FreeType Support enabled
      FreeType Linkage with freetype
      FreeType Version 2.4.6
      T1Lib Support enabled
      GIF Read Support enabled
      GIF Create Support enabled
      JPEG Support enabled
      libJPEG Version 6b
      PNG Support enabled
      libPNG Version 1.2.46
      WBMP Support enabled
      XBM Support enabled
      Directive Local Value Master Value
      gd.jpeg_ignore_warning 0 0
  2. On LAMP: (This combo does not work)
    • PHP
      5.3.3-7+squeeze15
    • ZIP
      Zip enabled
      Extension Version $Id: php_zip.c 300470 2010-06-15 18:48:33Z pajoye $
      Zip version 1.9.1
      Libzip version 0.9.0
    • XML
      XML Support active, XML Namespace Support active, libxml2 Version 2.7.8
    • GD2
      GD Support enabled
      GD Version 2.0
      FreeType Support enabled
      FreeType Linkage with freetype
      FreeType Version 2.4.2
      T1Lib Support enabled
      GIF Read Support enabled
      GIF Create Support enabled
      JPEG Support enabled
      libJPEG Version 6b
      PNG Support enabled
      libPNG Version 1.2.44
      WBMP Support enabled
      Directive Local Value Master Value
      gd.jpeg_ignore_warning 0 0.
  3. I found 1 problem (OS dependant issue) with the sys_get_temp_dir() PHP function. See the missing trailing slash issues. I fixed this in PHPEXcel/Shared/File.php by modifying the sys_get_temp_dir() function on line r106-r137
  4. Ive tried by using PHPExcel_Settings::setZipClass(PHPExcel_Settings::PCLZIP); as a possible solution to no avail.
Anyone any ideas?

I'm new to this tool - but my project is using the Excel 2007 writer just fine, running off an Ubuntu Server VirtualBox installation.

Are the examples/test PHP files working for you?

Are any errors showing up in your Apache log?
